org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades

Class BlockingBladeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BlockingBladeBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade, BlockingBlade

    @GwtIncompatible
public class BlockingBladeBase
extends BladeBase
implements BlockingBlade

    A blocking blade performs long computations, I/O or otherwise may block the thread.
